title: Why is there now a limit on how much RP I can purchase?
body: I don't understand why there is a limit on how much RP I can purchase per day. It said only 3 payments can be used per day to purchase RP. Is my money not good enough for you RIOT? I would like to buy Snowdown Showdown Skins and bundles please. since there is only a limited time to buy them.

replies.body:
Because Riot cares about your wallet? Who knows.

It's not a bad thing tbh, for a company to do this.

it is still kinda up to the individual what they do with their money though. if you are a billionaire and can afford it all. why can riot say no! its bad for you. no one stops me spending money on a %%%%load of cigarettes, i don't see how its anyone's responsibility but the individuals.
They're up until next month. Chill.
I guess if you got hacked someone could make thousands of dollars of purchases on your account
What exactly is the problem there?

well. you would have lost money when you didn't want to. and the hacker could gift themselves stuff, but it would be so easy to trace and fix by riot support, and i imagine they would be banned for it. but i do not see how preventing people from spending all their money is in riots interest.

its just in case an account is hacked and they have their credit card info saved on it or some sht like that. Limits the amount of money they can lose to $300 so they can report it without losing too much.

Also snowdown doesn't end until January 6th or something, so you should be fine.
